name: Skylit Midtown Castle
description: Beautiful, spacious skylit studio in the heart of Midtown, Manhattan. STUNNING SKYLIT STUDIO / 1 BED + SINGLE / FULL BATH / FULL KITCHEN / FIREPLACE / CENTRALLY LOCATED / WiFi + APPLE TV / SHEETS + TOWELSThe space- Spacious (500+ft≤), immaculate and nicely furnished & designed studio.- Tuck yourself into the ultra comfortable bed under the skylight. Fall in love with a myriad of bright lights in the city night sky. - Single-sized bed/convertible floor mattress with luxury bedding (available upon request).- Gorgeous pyramid skylight with amazing diffused natural light, stunning architectural details, soaring high vaulted ceilings, exposed brick, wood burning fireplace, floor seating area with natural zafu cushions, modern style mixed with eclectic art & antique treasures, large full bath, newly renovated kitchen, air conditioning/heat, high speed WiFi Internet, and Apple TV.- Centrally located in the heart of Midtown Manhattan
comment1: Apartment was very nice with  awsome view on the ocean .Grate location.
comment2: nice and clean apartment with a beautiful view
comment3: The experience was great! Will definitely stay again next year.

name: Whole flr w/private bdrm, bath & kitchen(pls read)
description: Enjoy 500 s.f. top floor in 1899 brownstone, w/ wood & ceramic flooring throughout, roomy bdrm, & upgraded kitchen & bathroomThis space is unique but one of the few legal AirBnbs with a totally private bedroom, private full bathroom and private eat-in kitchen, SO PLEASE READ "THE SPACE" CAREFULLYIt's sunny & loaded with everything you need! Your floor, and the common staircase/hallway/entryway are cleaned/sanitized per Airbnb's Enhanced Cleaning Protocol.The spaceWe host on the entire top floor of our double-duplex brownstone in Clinton Hill on Gates near Classon Avenue - (7 blocks to C train, 5 blocks to G train, minutes to downtown Brooklyn & lower Manhattan)It is not an apartment in the traditional sense, it is more of an efficiency set-up and is TOTALLY LEGAL with all short-term rental laws. The top floor for our guests consists of a sizable bedroom, full bath and eat-in kitchen for your exclusive use - you get the amenities of a private apartment
comment1: Great experience. Great host. Wonderful service. I am booking the location again when I am in town.
comment2: The apartment was as described, very clean and well maintained. More than needed was provided in terms of towels, cookware and dinnerware. The wifi in the apt was fast. The checkin and checkout were done smoothly and the hotel personal was always very helpful. The apartment caretaker was courteous and very quick and prompt to answer my questions. Very efficient. I will definitely be back.
comment3: Very nice property and location. Will definitely use again and again

name: BlissArtsSpace!
description: The spaceHELLO EVERYONE AND THANKS FOR VISITING BLISS ART SPACE! Thank you all for your support. I've traveled a lot in the last year few years, to the  U.K. Germany, Italy and France! Loved Paris, Berlin and Calabria! Highly recommend all these places. One room available for rent in a 2 bedroom apt in Bklyn. We share a common space with kitchen. I am an artist(painter, filmmaker) and curator who is working in the film industry while I'm building my art event production businesses.Price above is nightly for one person. Monthly rates available.  Price is $900 per month for one person. Utilities not included, they are about 50 bucks, payable when the bill arrives mid month. Couples rates are slightly more for monthly and 90$ per night short term. If you are a couple please Iet me know and I'll give you the monthly rate for that. Room rental is on a temporary basis, perfect from 2- 6 months - no long term requests please!
comment1: Great aparment, exactly as described on the web. If we come back i will rent it again.
comment2: The location was perfect, right across the street from the beach, towels and chairs provided on the beach, nice pool area with two hot tubs that our family used each night, overlooking the ocean.  The unit was as listed, clean, comfortable bed, pull out was shared by our two boys.  Valet is required but they were quick, and there is an extra fee for the internet.
comment3: We booked this place for my parents and they had the most fantastic stay! They loved everything about this room. All communication with Karim was excellent and check in was a breeze. The room was exactly as shown in photos and the view was incredible. The beach out front was perfect and the pool was also lovely. Breakfast by the pool was delicious. Lots of restaurants available within walking distance. Karim also has a couple lounge chairs and a beach umbrella for use so you don't have to rent them at the beach. I know my parents would stay here again in a heartbeat. Thanks for everything Karim.

name: Spacious Brooklyn Duplex, Patio + Garden
description: We welcome you to stay in our lovely 2 br duplex in South Slope, Brooklyn.  Our home is a truly spacious respite from the busy city- close to subways, restaurants, cafes and parks.  Enjoy a gourmet kitchen, patio, grill, backyard!The spaceSleeps 4 comfortably- king bed in master bedroom, 2 twin bunk beds in 2nd br.  We have a third bedroom that will be locked for storage. We are located just steps from 5th Ave. restaurants, bars, coffeeshops, and shopping + 3 blocks from the R train, 15 min walk to Prospect Park.Lower Manhattan is  a 15-20 min subway ride away.  Midtown/theater district 30-40 min subwayNote:  This is our home, we live here with our two chicldren and leave the condo clean.  Our belongings will remain in our house, and stowed away in closets / on shelves.  We will set aside room in closets and dressers for your use.Guest accessEntire duplex apt is free to use, except for computer desk, and selected
comment1: This was  really nice space with view of the ocean and as good as advertised.I would stay there again
comment2: This condo is fantastic. Staff were overly accommodating and hosts were contactable at all times. View from the balcony is worth this stay by itself! Will recommend
comment3: Excellent choice in ft lauderdale. Provides access to the Hilton resort gym.

name: Large Furnished Room
description: Please don't expect the luxury here just a basic room in the center of Manhattan.The spaceYou will use one large, furnished, private room of a two-bedroom apartment and share a bathroom with the host.  The apartment is located a few blocks away from Central Park between 8th and 9th Avenue.The closest subway station is Columbus Circle 59th Street.  Great restaurants, Broadway and all transportation are easily accessible. The cost of the room is $79 per night.  Weekly rate is available.There is a $12.00 fee per guest. The apartment also features hardwood floors and a second-floor walk-up. There is a full-sized bed,TV, microwave, and a small refrigerator as well as other appliances.  Wired internet, WIFI, TV, electric heat, bed sheets and towels are included. A kitchen is available in the living room. You can come in any time except midnight.  Basic check in/out time is 12pm. I am
comment1: Great Location. Grest Host. We felt very welcome and comfortable. Everything like on the pictures. The communication was perfect.
comment2: Great place , we enjoyed the stay . Near to restaurants and the mall. Beautiful view .
comment3: Quiet and upscale...exactly as advertised.  Loved it.  Thank you.

name: Cozy Clean Guest Room - Family Apt
description: Our best guests are seeking a safe, clean, spare room in a family apartment.  They are comfortable being independent, accommodating of family noise (quiet hours 11pm-7am), and aren't afraid of a friendly two year old golden lab (dog).  Our guests aren't put off by an old bathroom that while perfectly clean, has some peeling paint.  In short, our guests want to feel like they are staying at their sister's apartment while visiting the city! (only their sister changed the sheets and cleaned).The spaceStay in my family's little  guest room and enjoy privacy, a warm welcome, and security. Your guest room is comfortable and clean.   It is small but well outfitted, has a single bed and a fabulous mattress which is firm and yet pillowy on top, all at the same time. The bathroom is shared and immediately across the hall. ("Shared" in the sense it isn't "en suite." The family will use our second bath while you are staying with us). The bathroom is fully suppl
comment1: Just spent a wonderful week in this condo. My first experience with airbnb and this host and both are 5 star. The condo is triple mint condition and Karim is is very responsive to any questions. Pictures accurately represent the condo. Out the door and you are on the beach. Total luxury and the balcony is great for lunch or late night drinks. I will be a repeat customer after my best visit ever to Fort Lauderdale.
comment2: Everything was great.  We look forward to coming back in March
comment3: Beautiful condo in a great location with a great view.  Just be prepared for $39 per day for valet parking.

name: Cute & Cozy Lower East Side 1 bdrm
description: Live like a New Yorker instead of a stuffy, tiny, overpriced hotel. My small yet cozy one bedroom apartment is nestled in the southern part of the historic lower east side, steps to the subway and walking distance to the coolest neighborhoods.The spacePLEASE NOTE: do not automatically book with out messaging me first. Thanks!My apartment is a cute, cozy, 1 bdrm apt in the Lower East Side (LES) adjacent to Chinatown in lower Manhattan, steps to F train, East Broadway stop and very close to Canal/Delancey streets where many hip bars, restaurants and shops are in the LES. Apt is clean, has a fully equipped kitchen, cable TV, A/C, heat, and wireless internet. Apt is located on 2nd floor of well maintained walk up building. Walking distance to Soho, East Village, Little Italy, Chinatown and very close to Dumbo and Williamsburg, Brooklyn. You have place to yourself-better than a hotel! Prices listed are for up to two people only. Possibl
comment1: Our stay in Fort Lauderdale was fantastic. The apartment was absolutely perfect. Stunning views, convenient mini kitchen, huge bathroom, in suite washer/dryer all stylishly decorated. it was a breeze to check in/out and we used all the hotel amenities as well. I can't say enough about the apartment and we will definitely check with Karim when we need a relaxing sun vacation again.
comment2: We never met the owners but we had a great vacay at the hilton apartment. Nice and clean rooms with a ocean view balcony. The location was good, close to the beach, restaurants etc. Will definitely stay here again with my friends.
comment3: Everything was fine and as stated. Owner was responsive the couple of times we needed him

name: Spacious river view in the West Village
description: Beautiful, spacious, light-filled 1-bedroom apartment in historic neighborhood.The space(The cats in the photos have moved on to a fluffier abode in the sky - there are no feline residents in the apartment.)  Please forgive me (!), but I don't usually feel comfortable with 20-somethings. This is my precious home and I need reassurance that my guests are detail-oriented and conscientious. If you inquire, please share a bit about yourself -- thank you!Spacious, bright, 900-sqare-foot riverview apartment in the quiet, historic West Village (tree-lined streets, brownstones) steps from shops, restaurants, and many other great NYC neighborhoods. Adjacent to the trendy Meat Packing District, and easily walkable to Chelsea, Soho, Tribeca, the East Village, and more. Farmer's Market on Saturday's 2 blocks from apartment. Short subway ride to the Theater District, Upper West Side, Central Park, and even Brooklyn! Across the Street from Hudson River Park
comment1: Great room, great view, amazing bathroom and kitchen for a hotel room. The price is just right for the location. Will defiantly book again if/when we come back to Ft Lauderdale.
comment2: This condo quite didn't meet my expectations.  It showed clear signs of wear and tear and could have used a more thorough cleaning. At $400/night, I expected a lot more, but this is the trade-off when you rent someone else's house. Karim was very responsive throughout and offered to address some of my complaints.  But most of my issues were replace and/or repair which couldn't be completed in a 2 to 3 day window. This was my first experience with Airbnb and I wasn't thrilled with it. Renting out someone's home is NOT the same as renting a room from a professionally managed hotel. An obvious point perhaps, made crystal clear during my stay. With most hotels if you're dissatisfied with your room you are either given another room or only charged for the time you stay. Not with this property given the strict rental agreement. Once you pay, you're pretty much out the money. I understood this going in, but I thought there'd be more flexibility if the place wasn't quite up to par. Just something you should be aware of before signing on the dotted line.
comment3: Great location!  During our stay, Karim put us in touch with a gentleman named Gary who was immediately responding to any questions or concerns we had.    The condo was nice & clean.   We enjoyed the perks Hilton resorts, especially the pool area.   Would definitely consider renting from Karim again.

name: Lovely Room 1, Garden, Best Area, Legal rental
description: Discounted now!   Beautiful house, gorgeous garden, patio, cozy room, and helpful host!   Super safe and quiet in beautiful, vibrant Park Slope!  Please read,  then WRITE to me about your  trip, and needs.  Please do NOT request reservation until I reply "yes ".   I want to be sure it's right for you!Close to great restaurants, culture, Prospect Park.  3 minutes walk to 3 subway lines, 20 mins to Manhattan.LEGAL rental -- per NY laws.  Six gyms nearby.The spaceWelcome to an historic, stunning 4-story Brooklyn house, in super safe, quiet and friendly Park Slope.   140 year old house filled with light, color, artwork.  Large beautiful garden and patio.  Legal rental.  Top floor is private for you during Covid period. Three excellent SUBWAY LINES (R, F, G)   2 minutes walk, 20 mins to Manhattan. Please write to me with your details;   Wait til I reply "yes" before requesting room.Discounts available for longer stay.<
comment1:
I cannot say enough about both the host and the listing ... they were perfect!  Karim was extremely responsive and accommodating as I had to make a couple changes and was delayed a bit in making my final booking.  He returned every message within hours and answered every question I had.  The check-in process was a breeze, as Karim has provided very easy, detailed instructions for our arrival.

The room/condo was just as gorgeous in person as in the photos.  And the view was breathtaking.  Everything was very clean and all the necessities were provided.  The bed was extremely comfortable and the kitchenette was perfectly appointed.  

The Hilton itself is beautiful with a great pool on the 6th floor that overlooks the beach across the street.  And the beach is very nice with towels and water provided.  Is is within easy walking distance to plenty of shopping and restaurants, as well as jet-skiing and other beach activities.

My son and I truly enjoyed our stay and I highly recommend booking with Karim and his beautiful condo.
comment2: wonderful room and building. clean and well taken care of. air conditioning works very well. access to the pool and jacuzzi is simple and delightful. the beach is right there and restaurants are all in walking distance. wifi available. parking is cheaper at the avalon next door. we paid $70 for seven days, which was a great deal. if you want to really enjoy your stay in fort lauderdale, this room is it! Be smart and book it
comment3: Great location and wonderful communication with host and his assistant. Apt could use some cosmetic fixes and updates but overall quiet and peaceful.

name: Bright, Modern Garden Unit
description: Cleaning Protocol: Our cleaners follow the Airbnb's enhanced cleaning protocol, which thoroughly cleans and sanitizes the apartment between all guests.Construction: The house next door is under construction. Rates are discounted.Our bright garden unit overlooks a grassy backyard area with fruit trees and native plants. It is an oasis in a big city. The apartment comfortably fits a couple or small family. It is located on a cul de sac street that ends at lovely Duboce Park.The spaceNewly remodeled, modern, and bright garden unit in historic Victorian home. New fixtures and finishes.Zero VOC and non-toxic paint.Organic and fair-trade teas, fresh local ground coffee.Local art on walls.Sofa bed and Queen bed are in the same room. More of a petite apartment with a separate room for dining and kitchen.Guest accessFull access to patio and backyard (Shared)Beautiful garden with f
comment1: Excellent condo and looks exactly as pictured. Owners were awesome and helpful.  Resort was great too.
comment2: I stayed in Karim's unit for 4 daus in April. The Condo is exactly as described and in excellent condition. The hotel was wonderful to deal with and provided us with the same service as if we were thier personal guests. The room had an amazing view and there was everything you need for your stay. Although we never did meet Karim - his contact Gary did reach out to us on different occasions to offer help and see if everything was ok. The location was excellent close to shops and restaurants.  I would definitely recommend this unit to anyone visiting Ft Lauderdale.
comment3: What a great place on the beach! Amazing view, easy walks, and all of the things you would expect from a Hilton property. Definitely use this again when needed.

name: Creative Sanctuary
description: The spaceWe live in a large Victorian house on a quiet street, nestled between the Mission district and Noe Valley. We're one block from the streetcar stop and five blocks from the subway. We have three bedrooms, two of which have double beds and windows which cast their light upon the high, warm colored walls and ceilings of this haven. We have lots of spaces in the house where you can relax, read, listen to music and just cozy up. The kitchen is well stocked and we have a bountiful garden and back deck.   Amenities include: Laundry, wireless, sun room, garden, sun deck and a full kitchen. We also have a library (not perfectly organized but filled with great books).  We both are self employed creatives. I own a business involved in art and design and Tania is an arts journalist. We enjoy meeting people and are well versed in the art and design communities of the Bay Area. We also know some really good haunts.Guest accessOur
comment1: We travelled to Fort Lauderdale for work/pleasure on very short notice.  Karim was very helpful throughout the reservation process and also assisted us once we had arrived.  The unit that we rented was perfect for our needs.  It provided us with a small, clean kitchenette that allowed us to have some of our meals "at home" rather than having to eat each meal out.  The unit had a beautiful balcony that provided a nice view of the beach across the street.  The amenities were available to us as well, and we enjoyed the pool and fitness center.  Would highly recommend the unit.  Space is ideal for a couple, however, there is enough room for 4 comfortably.  This would require 2 to sleep in the king bed in the bedroom and 2 to sleep on the pull out sofa.  No sleeping complaints from my teenage children.
comment2: It was my first AirBnB experience and it was a good one.  Exactly as described and accurate.
comment3: Place is exactly as the pictures. Great views of the water. Nice building (combo hotels/condos) with a good pool area

name: A Friendly Room - UCSF/USF - San Francisco

Room with sink(apartment style - shared large eat in kitchen/2 full & 2 half  bathrooms). Quiet house under management. Wa
comment1: Karim was very accommodating and the house was lovely.  The place had the perfect mix of pool and beach.  I would recommend Karim's suite to any of my friends.
comment2: The apartment was advertised just as the photos.. great location, great hotel.  Karim was very accomodating and responsive to any questions I had.  I would highly recommend this unit and would return again in the future.
comment3:
The apartment is just perfect! 
The beach and restaurants are close by so that everything is in walking distance :-) And the view from the balcony is amazing! 
At the back of the hotel there is another small apartment block where you can get a cheap parking place :-)

Many thanks again for the great time at your apartment Karim!

comment1: Wonderful Stay!!!
comment2: My wife and I stayed at Karims condo for two weeks.  Everything was perfect.  We enjoyed our stay and look forward to visiting again.
comment3: Great location, wonderful view of the beach. Easy check in, and friendly staffs of the resort. We really enjoyed our stay.

name: Historic Alamo Square Victorian
description: Pls email before booking. Interior featured in magazines. Listed historic with the City of SF. Steps away from the iconic Alamo Square "Painted Ladies".The spacePlease send us a quick message before booking :) Victorian flat in Queen Ann Victorian. Interior featured in magazines. Listed historic with the City of San Francisco. Steps away from the iconic Alamo Square "Painted Ladies" postcard panorama. Tour buses pause. This spacious sunny apartment is well known by local photographers for its ambiance and beautiful natural light. (Rental does not imply permission for commercial photography use) Centrally located close to public transport, top restaurants, shops, arts and entertainment near NOPA/Alamo square/Haight/Hayes. 2 blocks away from public transpo.Safe walkable neighborhood. Authentic Updated Victorian experience. This Queen Anne Victorian was built by a noted Victorian a
comment1: Perfect apartment in a Hilton apartment hotel. Nice and clean, magnificent view. Jaccuzi, high standard, kitchen with everything you need. Couldn't with more than that. Highly recommended if you don't want to pay more and do not need housekeeping.
comment2: The condo was perfect. Just as described. Hotel staff were great. Perfect location. Great pool and access to ocean. Would recommend   Tks Karim
comment3: This is a great spot! We loved our stay at Karim's. The views were beautiful, the unit was very comfortable, well stocked and well maintained. Karim was a very responsive and well organized host, and he made it possible for us to have a great week. The location is fantastic, you step out of the building, cross the road and you are on the beach. The location is central, easy to get around and next to many coffee shops and restaurants. I'd highly recommend this spot. The photos are accurate, but the views are even better in person.

name: Mission Sunshine, with Private Bath
description: Welcome to "The Mission," the sunniest neighborhood in town. Enjoy world-class dining, shopping, and nightlife on Valencia, or a Tartine picnic in Dolores Park, all just steps from our 100 year old home. We've been Hosts since Airbnb's 1st year (2009), and can suggest restaurants or insider sight-seeing ideas. We love our home, our hometown, and our neighborhood, and we look forward to sharing them with you.PLEASE click below to read more about this private room and bath in a shared home.The spaceYour sunny room looks out over a lush garden, and includes all the comforts of home... Queen bed, sofa, dresser, closet, and a rocking chair. Just up the hall, your private bathroom has a "like rain" shower head over a clawfoot tub. (The bathroom is not "en-suite.")For a third guest (or for two guests who want separate beds) there is a full second bedroom available. ($60/night, and only available if you book Mission Sunshine.)<
comment1: Loved it. Exactly the way it was described. It is also within walking distance to a Publix grocery store, and if you don't want to carry the bags back you can take the Sun Trolley for $1. Overall we had a fantastic time and would love to come back again.
comment2: Karim was more than helpful with our stay, and I would definitely connect again for a future stay.
comment3: We enjoyed our stay in Karim's place!! Everything was as described. Beautiful view. Spacious rooms. Fool kitchen. Definitely will stay again!!

name: Artful Potrero Separate Floor with Garden

comment3:
This condo is definitely only comfortable for two people.  The unit is tight for a family even though it can sleep four.  There is no table to sit at for meals.
The unit was dusty and the hotel was not as clean as others that I have experienced.  Valet parking was $40.00/day.  We managed to rent a parking space from Fortuna rentals for $20.00/day located across the hotel.  The view from the balcony was nice but I would not rate this condominium as luxuries as described.

name: Victorian Suite in Inner Mission
description: The spacePlease read this before you book!Second floor Suite, fully furnished with lovely colors and furniture throughout. The suite is a section of our Victorian home reserved for our guests' exclusive use. Sleeps up to 6: Queen bed, trundle bed (makes two singles), and sofa bed.Features: * Hardwood floors and Victorian details throughout * Working fireplace * *High ceilings and lots of natural light * Large open kitchen, dining & living area * New dishwasher, new stove, new refrigerator, fully stocked with kitchenware *  Flat screen TV, wireless Internet * Master bedroom with queen bed and walk in closet * Second bedroom with trundle bed and small desk * Full bath with large tub * Beautiful garden* Rates: $4,000 per monthCleaning fee of $100.$500 Security deposit required, payable through Airbnb. It will be returned within 48 hours of guest's departure, provided there is no damage, abuse, breakage, or missing items. <
comment1: We had a great visit... just what we expected!
comment2:
This was a nice place to spend a week for our vacation.  We appreciated the option of going to the beach or to the pool. 

This space is on the 21st floor of a Hilton high-rise and is privately owned.  I am glad we read the fine print because when we arrived, the front desk wasn't able to find our reservation.  We found another email with instructions and we were able to get checked in. 

Parking is a serious issue if you don't want to pay $35.00 per night.  The listing explains there is another hotel nearby with a cheaper option; however, it is closed for construction.  There is street parking but it is limited to 4 hour blocks for 24 hours.
comment3: The place is located in a great area wonderful beaches shopping. High quality apartment.

name: Classic Nob Hill Studio - Roof Deck
description: A cute studio with nice street views and lots of light and easy access to a shared roof deck with awesome Golden Gate views. Great, classic "Old Frisco" neighborhood.New double-pane windows help keep out the sounds of the city.The spaceFeatures:  Elevator, Wood floors, TV, DVD Player, Internet, Cable, Roof-top deck. Kitchen: Stove, Microwave, Coffee maker, Toaster, Oven, Pots and Pans, Dishwasher, Dishes. Beds: 1 Double bed(s). Extras: Dryer, Washer, Towels, Toilet paper. Charming studio located in residential and undeniably charming Nob Hill, San Francisco's most desirable destination. One block from Grace Cathedral and easy walking distance to famous Union Square shopping, the theatre district, Chinatown, and Fishermen's Wharf. Or hop on a cable car or grab a bus on the corner. Rather stay local? Walk over to Huntington Park or check out the neighborhood's many bars, bistros, and ea
comment1: A fantastic room!!! Thanks!!
comment2: Great Condo and Fantastic location. We had a super stay and can recommend the place to others.
comment3: Pictures say it all. This place was amazing! Can't wait to come back. Huge plus having 2 beach chairs in the room to use.

name: Zen-East in the Heart of Austin (monthly rental)
description: Zen East is situated in a vibrant & diverse multicultural neighborhood, within walking distance of many great restaurants, cafes, performance/art spaces, UT campus, downtown & just a few miles from a beautiful trail ~ Ladybird Lake.NOTE: As of 1/20/18, new home construction with intermittent noise is happening at lot next door typically b/w hours of 8 - 5:30 pm. Exterior is 90% complete.The spaceThis colorful and clean 1923 house was completely remodeled in 2004. The house is a 2BR/ 2BA (1350 sq') with a pillow top queen bed in the large master with full private bath and a double futon bed (floor level) in an office which converts to a small guest room adjacent to a full bathroom in the hallway. The following amenities are included: CACH, WIFI, HDTV, washer/dryer, fully equipped kitchen, street parking, fenced back yard with semi privacy fence/deck and front yard with covered porch, pecan, crepe myrtle and other trees provide shade and floral displa
comment1: What a great experience, What a great place!  We had a fantastic time at Karim's place.  The view was fabulous and the entire process was without one issue.  We spent our days at the pool and beach.  Thats it! thats all we needed.  The staff at the hotel were super friendly and accommodating.  Will most definitely do it again!
comment2: The host had been helpful. His contact assisted with finding cheaper parking right across from the hotel as parking at the hotel is valet only and can add35-40 a night. Staff working at hotel is great.
comment3: Great place! Very clean! Such a great location - walking distance to beach/shops and great food. Only complaint is that there's no phone in the room, so you can't call ahead for the valet to get your car and it takes about 10 minutes for them to get it.

name: Eco friendly, Colorful, Clean, Cozy monthly share
description: Situated in a vibrant & diverse multicultural neighborhood & within walking distance of many great restaurants, cafes, performance/art spaces, UT campus, downtown & just a few miles from a beautiful trail ~ Ladybird Lake.The spaceThis green, colorful, clean and cozy house was built in 1923 and remodeled in 2004. As the homeowner, I've taken the liberty to paint each room a different color. The house has plenty of light, shade trees, a fenced back yard and deck, a front porch for sitting with simple landscaping. Conveniently located in central east Austin, you are: 1 - 2 miles from the University of Texas, Downtown & the Austin Convention Center. You'll find yourself near local cafes and restaurants (Eastside, El Chile, Blue Dahlia, Eastside Pies, Bennu, Salty Sow, Farmacie, Dai Due, Justine's and much more). You're ~ 3 miles from Wheatsville Food Coop, Whole Foods (downtown), Central Market & the Lady Bird Lake trail.  Just a 5 minute wa
comment1: My husband and I enjoyed our stay in Ft. Lauderdale. Prior to our departure Karim walked me through the reservation process and promptly answered my questions, as this was my first experience reserving with Airbnb. The photos posted represented the condo accurately. It was clean with a nice size bathroom providing two sinks, shower, and jaccuzzi-type bathtub. As assured,the kitchenette was fully equipped. We ate breakfast and lunch on the balcony listening to the ocean waves and watching the couples and families enjoying the beach. What an incredible view! The location of the condo gave us easy access to restaurants; however, we usually ventured out eating at establishments elsewhere. Taxis were always at hand which made movement around Ft. Lauderdale easy. I recommend staying at Karim's condo, as our comfort was foremost in his mind!
comment2:
What a relaxing week! I'm so happy with my stay at Karim's condo. It was everything I expected and more. It was clean, with an amazing view and the most ideal location. 

There is no need to rent a car when staying at this condo. All mayor shops and restaurants are within walking distance. The view alone is worth the stay. 

There is no other place I will stay in Fort Lauderdale. Thank you Karim!
comment3: Spacious 1 bedroom unit with fantastic view and great location.Beach chairs were appreciated

name: Walk to 6th, Rainey St and Convention Ctr
description: Great central  location for walking to Convention Center, Rainey Street, East 6th Street, Downtown, Congress Ave Bats.  Free wifiNo Smoking,  No petsThe spaceCute Private Studio apartment located in Willow Spence National Historic District.  It is  walking distance from Convention Center (3 1/2 blks) and Entertainment District. Save on cab fares.  Bus stop around the corner, takes you straight downtown.  Worried about food?  Great food abounds!  Iron works BBQ 3 blks away,  Cenote and 24 HR IHOP 2 blks away,   Rainey Street with bars and restaurants only 2 1/2 blks away , all within a safe walking distance.  Whole Foods and Target 6 blks away. The apartment is located upstairs above garage, completely separate from the main house.  This little 1930's apartment features wood floors and lots of windows.   The kitchen has a full size refrigerator, sink, granite counter-top, microwave, hotpot, toaster oven and coffee-maker.
comment1: The room was beautiful and just like the pictures online. The view was amazing. You get a great view of Fort Lauderdale as well as the beach. We didn't have any problems throughout our stay. I would recommend Karim's condo to all my friends.
comment2: We just ended a 6 night stay. Pre-travel information provided by Karim covered among others, check-in and alternative parking information (highly recommend this). The location and view was lovely, the apartment matched the view. We had one small problem with the kitchen light. Karim's local contact told us to talk to maintenance/front desk. They told us the apt is not part of their service responsibility. The point being, one might risk being thrown between the host for such minor things. We did'nt bother to take this further. It did not rob us of the overall experience, which was good.
comment3: emplacement de reve si vous voulez vous relaxer et profiter de la piscine et de la plage!

name: Soco, Barton Springs Private Guest Cottage
description: MONTHLY Short Term Located in the awesome Bouldin Creek "hood." This private Guest apartment is quiet yet close to the action! Just 1.5 south of downtown. Bike or walk to eateries, shopping, the So/Co district, Lady Bird Lake, beautiful BARTON SPRINGS/Zilker Park, beer gardens, bars, land live music venues.  Public transportation is on the corner.The spaceHip area in old South Central Austin (SoCo)Just 5 minutes south of downtown. 5 minutes or so to Lady Bird Lake, Auditorium Shores, Hike and Bike Trail, Zilker Park/Barton Springs, live music, cafes/restaurants, Alamo Draft House. Furnished private guest apt. 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom. Kitchen appliances, Fridgerator with Ice Maker, Vintage gas Stove, Coffee Maker, microwave  and housewares.  Small backyard and deck. Sleeps 2 (1 queen bed in the bedroom and a day bed in the living area)30 minutes from beautiful Lake Travis and the beautiful Texas Hill Country.20 minutes fro
comment1: Perfect apartment in a Hilton apartment hotel. Nice and clean, magnificent view. Jaccuzi, high standard, kitchen with everything you need. Couldn't with more than that. Highly recommended if you don't want to pay more and do not need housekeeping.
comment2:
We stayed here for 5 days during our two week trip to America on our honeymoon and it was without a doubt the best accommodation of the trip. The apartment is huge and great that it's located within the hotel as we had use of the pool area and the bar downstairs. The location is perfect right on the beach and there are loads of amazing restaurants nearby to eat at. Fort Lauderdale itself is a great place to visit but having a great place like this to come back to made it even better! 

Thanks Karim 

Hannah & Stephen
comment3: Great value. Wonderful location. Would stay again.

name: NW Austin Room
description: The spaceLooking for a comfortable inexpensive room to stay for a night?  A week or more?  Join us in our northwest Austin home where the house is tidy, nicely decorated and we are friendly, responsible, courteous hosts. Single or couples welcome.  I have one small, very shy and quiet dog and we welcome travelers from all over.  You can enjoy your coffee in the morning on the deck with a large backyard, or in the dining area.  Your own Parking spot can be found in front of the house on the granite gravel driveway just beside the mailbox.  The bedroom available in this listing accommodates two persons on a queen bed.   It is next to my study and craft room that sometimes serves as another guest room for a visiting family member or friend but rarely have anyone stay unless I decide to open up this additional space for SXSW, ACL, etc.  This room listing is my primary listing but wanted you to be aware of the 2nd bedroom that may on rare occasions be occupied by an
comment1: We came all the way from British Columbia Canada to experience Ft. Lauderdale and were very happy with our accommodations and location!  The room, amenities and beach were amazing.  The staff at the hotel were very friendly and we did not want or need for anything.  Check-in was a breeze and the room was clean and comfortable.  Hilton is not far from shopping, restaurants, snorkeling, fishing or tours.  Definitely go to the Cheese Culture on Las Olas, Lester's Diner, Giorgio's on 17th Street and The Local House in Miami Beach.
comment2:
Everything was pretty much as I expected based on description and reviews.
It is a lovely condo inside the Hilton, so you have access to hotel amenities.  It has a very comfy bed and a great view.  There is construction going on right below the balcony.  They did seem to stop around 5 (but start at 7am; didn't effect me as I was in a conference) but it would have otherwise.  So might wanna find out the status of that.
Otherwise, all goes smoothly and it's nice to check in anytime (hotel style) and I had a great stay there and in Ft. Lauderdale.  And last minute booking, it was less expensive than comparable hotels, for sure!
ps.  great that there's beach chairs and umbrella to take down so you can avoiding  renting them:)
comment3: Location is very convenient. Owner is very easy to get into contact with and is very helpful. Would come back again

name: Gem of a Studio near Downtown
description: Great studio apartment, perfect a single person or a couples. Just 1 mile into downtown. Convenient for walking, biking, rideshare or busing into downtown, UT campus and other central Austin spots. Close to Dell Seton Medical Center and St. David's hospitals. Walk to the 10-mile looped Town Lake Trail. Airy space with very nice amenities, fresh coffee beans and a private patio.The spaceAvailable as a monthly rental now.Large, contemporary studio apartment available for monthly and short-term corporate rentals. It's just south of the river and walkable to much of Austin's downtown scene.Our studio apartment sits above the garage and is detached from our main house. It's nicely appointed with plenty of modern amenities. A 37" HDTV with DirecTV Now, Netflix, Amazon, etc., nice cotton sheets, a full kitchen, great private patio with lounge chairs and umbrella, broadband wi-fi, a full bath and shower with its own tankless water heater and mor
comment1: We had an amazing trip! This is a terrific suite (exactly as depicted) with a breathtaking view of the ocean, beach, and part of the city. The resort is very nice, and the pool overlooks the ocean. Karim answered every question promptly, and management even called to check on us to make sure everything was absolutely perfect. We definitely recommend this AirBnB! Five stars!
comment2: Such a great spot for a get-away. Fantastic location, awesome view and quick responses to inquiries.
comment3: We had a wonderful time!  The unit is spacious, comfortable and has a great view.

name: Secluded Studio at Barton Springs
description: Clean, private space with everything you need for a quiet, comfortable, private stay close to Barton Springs, the river, parks, trails, and downtown. Quality furnishings and amenities will make you feel like you're staying at home rather than in a rental or hotel. We clean after guests leave and we disinfect surfaces to kill germs/viruses. We also offer contactless check-in/checkout and leave a day between bookings.**Note that CoA tax will be collected at checkin (see below)**The spaceStay in our lovely 1 bedroom garage apartment and enjoy the quiet of our 78704 'hood while being close-in for all the fun!Walking distance to Austin's outdoor spaces and downtown. Zilker Park, Barton Springs pool, Barton Creek green belt/trails, Hike and Bike trail, and other outdoor entertainment all within one mile. 5-10 min walk to restaurants with outdoor seating (Chuy's, Juliet, Ski Shores) and Barton Springs Bike Rental. Want more? 20 minute walk into
comment1: The condo is in a great spot with a great view. Very clean. Karim responded quickly to all of our questions.
comment2: The Rental Process was smooth - and Karim provided all necessary information.  The condo was as advertised and quite nice.  Great view and balcony - and very nice master bed and bathroom.  Pull out couch was not suitable for our two kids (10 and 13) to sleep on together - small and not comfortable (kinda what you would expect for a pull out couch such as this...)   Would be fine for one child (we put the mattress on the floor for our older daughter) but would not recommend for adults or multiple people.  Good service provided by the hotel as needed...and access to all of the resort's amenities.  Would definitely recommend.
comment3: Great and comfortable space. The balcony is great to listen to the waves. Better views than pictures. The pool area is great and easy to get to nearby food. We used Uber and Lyft and skipped a car rental. For the day we did rent a car, we just rented from a nearby Avis and returned late at night to skip dealing with parking. Overall fantastic! Not a big deal to us, but there is construction next door as they build a new residence building. Something to keep in mind as they started at 730 am.

name: Blue Boy Club House / Music Venue
description: This property is a 3 bdr 2 bath in south Austin that has a country/park like feeling.  It can be rented for up to 6 people for multiple nights ($300 per night) or for larger events ($500 per night for 50 people single night allowed ) with use of the stage for a dj/live band etc for birthday parties, house parties, celebrations etc.  Outdoor music can play until around 10 pm.  There is plenty of parking, outdoor facilities and a huge stage and party pit.  There will be a walkthrough for events.The spaceWhat stands out here is that the property is very large with huge trees a stage and party pit plus a very large above ground pool and a sauna.  It is very private yet very close to shopping, restaurants etc.  Sorry but pets are not allowed.  The interior has been recently updated (new paint, floors etc)  in September 2019.Guest accessGuest will have access to the pool (summer only) the stage (when prearranged) and a huge yard plus access t
comment1: We had a wonderful time!  The condo is spacious, comfortable and you can can gaze at the ocean.   We walked across the street to the beach and also to restaurants - the location is great.
comment2: This is an excellent condo, in a terrific hotel.  The location is perfect, right across the street from the beach.  The apartment is comfortable, nicely furnished, with a kitchenette and a big bathroom, with jacuzzi tub.  I stayed here with my husband and 2 kids (ages 9 and 11), with two of us on the fold-out couch - it worked out perfectly.  Nice view of the ocean, nice balcony.  Also a good gym, nice pool, and Starbucks in the lobby - perfect getaway.  Karim was very responsive and helpful, and the staff at hotel was there to troubleshoot any issues as well.  Highly recommend.
comment3:
We rented through Karim at the last minute after getting let down by another Private Owner in the same building. Initially Karim couldn't accommodate us as he needs 24hrs notice and we were giving 24 mins notice! He went above and beyond and managed to get us in that night. For that I am very grateful. He responded really well with comms through the app as well. 

The apartment is nice. Good view. It's North facing though so the amount of sun is limited. 

The Hilton is overpriced for what it is. It was busy though so maybe it just wasn't to my tastes. 

The parking is $45 per day I think in the hotel. There is a group of hotels called the North Ocean Hotels. They allow you to park in their hotels for $10 per day. You can use any of them. I paid at one and then parked at the Aqua that is just across the road. That makes staying here a little less expensive. 

All in I would recommend Karim and his apartment.

name: Quiet and Chic Mid-Century Retreat with Yard.
description: Indulge in BBQ on the spacious patio, or enjoy the full chef's kitchen featuring a waterfall island that opens to the living room. Fully equipped and centrally located, this chic Austin home is an ideal base from which to both explore and unwind.
comment1: Perfect apartment in a Hilton apartment hotel. Nice and clean, magnificent view. Jaccuzi, high standard, kitchen with everything you need. Couldn't with more than that. Highly recommended if you don't want to pay more and do not need housekeeping.
comment2: We had another great vacation staying in Karim's Condo.  The space is comfortable and has a great view of the ocean.  The hotel is wonderfully located, across the street from the beach.  It is walkable to restaurants and stores, but also has very good food in it's several restaurants.  This was our third year here, and we just loved the experience.
comment3: You will truly enjoy your living arrangements if you book this condo!!  The view is priceless and the bed is s (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) comfortable that you'll have to make yourself get out of it.  Being able to walk to the beach and lots of local happenings was wonderful, as I really didn't want to worry about driving.  The hotel staff were all really incredible and so friendly.    I also enjoyed being able to grab beach chairs and an umbrella from the closet (provided for you) and heading across the street to the beach.  I don't think there's one thing you'd regret if you book this condo.  I plan to book this condo again upon my return to the area!!!

name: Private Pool, Non Smoking, Pet Friendly, Central
description: Quaint guest house is pet friendly with a private pool, off-street parking, Central Austin/West Campus area, located within walking distance to UT & convenient to downtown and live music venues. Tobacco-free property. Monthly stays only.The spaceLocated only a few blocks from the University of Texas in the West Campus area and just minutes from downtown, this cute and comfortable smoke-free 2BR/1BA house is right in the heart of Austin. The guest house is located on the second floor on the back of the lot. (See photos for full view of house and carport.) The master bedroom has a king size bed & overlooks the large swimming pool & heated spa. Second bedroom has one full/double bed, one twin bed, and a TV with satellite. Kitchen is fully equipped and gigabit wireless Internet is available - even by the pool. Plenty of off-street parking and convenient to shopping, music venues, and most major tourist attractions. House is in a quiet neighborhood with lots of tree
comment1: My wife and I decided to stay at this suite and contacted Karim. He contacted us the same day letting us know that this place was not available,but he did contact us later offering us another suite in the hotel, which we accepted right away. Communication with Karim great. He always got back to us in a timely manner.Instructions on how to check in were easy and check in went smoothly. When we opened the door to the suite, we were blown away by the view, and how great the suite was. Everything described about the suite is spot on. Getting to the beach is so easy, go out the door, cross A1A and boom, you're there. Getting around town if you don't have a vehicle is easy, you can go by foot, taxi(which are abundant) or the Sun Trolley. But if you do drive, be prepared to pay $32.95 a night  for valet parking. We had a great time in the beautiful city of Ft. Lauderdale!
comment2: My family and I absolutely loved our stay at this hotel suite. The suite itself has fabulous views and easily accommodated the four of us. In addition, the property is extremely family-friendly and allowed us to combine the best of beach, resort, and private vacations -- all about 100 feet from the Atlantic Ocean beach. We really enjoyed this stay.
comment3: Great place at a great location. Can't wait for my next trip to Fort Lauderdale I will definitely keep this place in mind.

name: Oceanview luxury hotel suite
description: Luxury property located in the heart of the Ft. Lauderdale beach. This hotel/condo offers amazing ocean views and comes with all the amenities of a luxury resort such as a ocean front infinity edge pool, beach cabanas, fitness center/spa. All the comforts of home and a glorious ocean view are waiting. Located on the 21st floor the 1 bedroom suite boosts a private balcony and stainless steel kitchen. Designer furniture, 750 sq feet of living space along with a cushy King sized bed in the master bedroom ensures an indulgent and restful stay. Living room offers a full sofa bed. Guests also receive access to the Hotel Pool, Hot Tub, Q Spa and Fitness Room. Can't beat the location. The Fort Lauderdale Beach Resort is located on the shoreline of Fort Lauderdale's exclusive north beach, between the palm-shaded boulevards of Sunrise and Las Olas and minutes from the Fort Lauderdale/Hollywood International Airport, chic shopping, attractions for all ages, and exquisite dining options.  Enjoy a
comment1: I cannot rave enough about this place! My boyfriend and I enjoyed 5 nights in Karim's unit at the Hilton and hope to come back as soon as we can! Aside from not being able to charge anything to the room and not having maid service (no big deal), we were treated like regular guests at the Hilton with full access to all amenities. The kitchenette allowed us to stock up the mini-fridge and eat some meals on our balcony, which overlooks the ocean while shielding us from the wind - just perfect! The place was spacious, and you could even visit as a family since we discovered that the couch had a pull-out double bed. Karim was also kind enough to allow us to check out in the late afternoon since we were on a nighttime flight back home which was a huge help! The pool at the Hilton is beautiful and you don't get closer to the beach than this. The place is exactly as described and there is plenty in the neighbourhood to keep you entertained. On the one rainy day we had, we walked over the Enterprise car rental one block over and rented a car to go do some shopping at Sawgrass Mills....otherwise there was really no need for one, especially since parking at the Hilton is so pricey. We loved our stay here!
comment2:
Amazing location and beautiful Condo in an upscale location right on the Ft Lauderdale beach.   Very helpful hotel staff with  Starbucks and great restaurants in hotel and nearby.  Karim is responsive and on top of any questions that come up.

Highly recommend!
comment3: A few hiccups checking in (hotel staff is not very good at handling residence guests or unusual issues/changes) but host overall is extremely responsive and maintains excellent communication.  Wonderful location and hotel has very nice amenities.

name: PRIVATE HOUSE NEAR BEACH SLEEP 5
description: Beautifully private duplex that allows you to enjoy the zen of life!  Watch the neighbors walking their pets...jogging near the lake...or riding their bikes, or join in and jog to the beach!  If you don't want to disconnect...we have WIFI! Please note:  Since this is my home, I only rent to people who aren't afraid to put a validated picture/profile (that AIRBNB has verified) on their page before I decide. Don't hide who you are... Peaceful house on Nature Preserve Close to everything. Hollywood, Florida Vacation Rental, South East, Florida, USA  Accommodations: 2 bedrooms and 1 full bathrooms. This house has a living room with a leather sectional and a beautiful fireplace (even though it's Florida). Beautifully loaded kitchen w/granite countertops and bar, Dining Room, Living room. Tres Chique!   New flat screen TV.  Can sleep 4.   This precious house is located on a quiet street. There is beautiful walking, jogging and biking in very scenic residential neighborhoods. Holland Park is
comment1: A most beautiful and comfortable apartment in a great hotel and setting. Karim was always there to answer our questions and be helpful, 24/7. We had a wonderful stay - thank you Karim. Highly recommended!!!
comment2: Karim is a great host. The place was excellent. Amazing location and lots of amenities. Beautiful ocean view from the condo. Would stay there again!
comment3: The view from this unit is spectacular and the proximity to the beach, restaurants, etc is fantastic. We would definitely come back. We loved the amenities at the hotel as well.

name: 2 bd/2ba Oceanfront Condo
description: Beautiful and meticulous 2 master suite luxury oceanfront condo fully furnished and equipped with WIFI, digital cable and unlimited long distance in the US and Canada. Building is full of amenities including tennis court, swimming pool, jacuzzi, workout room, covered and valet parking, direct beach access. Conveniently located in Hallandale Beach between Miami and Fort Lauderdale, you're just minutes from two international airports, two seaports, as well as world-class shopping at Bal Harbour and Aventura. And just minutes away from Hollywood Beach Boardwalk, one of the five best boardwalks in the country as ranked by Travel & Leisure. Minimum rental is 30 days.  Available beginning May 1st, 2011. Call for additional details.
comment1: The listing was exactly as described.  In fact, it far exceeded our expectations!  The property itself is lovely and "ready to live in."  There is a fabulous view of both the intra-coastal waterway to your left and the ocean to your right as the property is on the side of the building.  This makes it very breezy and comfortable to use the table/chair unit outside.  The main living area is spacious and the bathroom has double sinks and great makeup lighting.  There is also a cubed all-glass rainwater shower in the corner that I loved.  Of course, it was a difficult choice between that and the jacuzzi tub!  A safe in the closed of the bedroom was a nice touch as was the washer/dryer unit.  There is just enough kitchen space to make small meals and all the utensils/cookings items there to do so.  The people on the Hilton property are outstanding hosts, too: everyone was exceptionally friendly.  The location is excellent and we truly relaxed and enjoyed ourselves.  This is our new pre- and post-cruise spot from now on!  I'll probably ask to return before the summer is over to just hang out with a few girlfriends before we return to teaching.  We can just hang by that lovely pool area!
comment2: Karim is an outstanding host and extremely responsive.  The location is perfect for Ft. Lauderdale beach, has spectacular views and access to the amenities of the Hilton (pool, gym, etc.).  The place is very clean, neat and comfortable.  Thanks for the great stay!
comment3:
It was the first trip to Miami for most of us in my group of 6 and we couldn't have gotten a more spacious and convenient place to stay! It had fully equipped kitchen and laundry room. The place was close to the beach, a decent distance from Miami downtown and also to other restaurants and stores. And not to mention Hard Rock casino within 10 mins distance, if you are feeling lucky ;)  We also had a nice welcome wine waiting for us :) 

The house was very spacious, with 3 big rooms and a nice lawn. The owners were very receptive to any issues we had. Overall, a great place to stay and nice owners!

I would highly recommend this place for everyone to stay.

name: MARY POP APTS 2/1 APT SLEEP 5
description: MARY POP APARTMENTS 1&2 BEDROOM SUITES ACCOMMODATION 1-5 PEOPLE, WE ARE OFFERING TEMPORARY ACCOMMODATIONS SHORT TERM, LONGER TERM UP TO 6 MONTHS , VACATIONERS, RELOCATIONS FROM OTHER SATES OR COUNTRIES TO SOUTH FLORIDA, CORPORATE HOUSING, NOTE: WE ARE HERE TO HELP YOU . TEMPORARY ACCOMMODATION, VACATION RENTALS, CORPORATE HOUSING, RELOCATIONS, HOUSING FOR TRAVELING NURSES,  HOUSING FOR STUDENTS, CONTACT US FOR DETAILS   RENOVATED 2 BEDROOM 1 BATH APARTMENT 900 SQ FT.  MARY POP APARTMENTS 29 E SHERIDAN ST, DANIA BEACH FL  FREE TRANSPORTATION TO FORT LAUDERDALE AIRPORT AND PORT EVERGLADES FREE BIKES TO THE BEACH   HOTEL RATES IN THIS AREA ARE $100-$150/NIGHT FOR 1 ROOM, MARY POP APARTMENTS IS OFFERING 4 ROOMS FOR LESS Activities  Pier Fishing  Medical Services  Massage Therapist  Kayaking  Snorkeling  Scuba Diving Or Snorkeling  ATM/Bank  Fitness Center  Shopping  Laundromat  Hospital  Groceries  Swimming  Racquetball  Snorkeling/Diving  Jet Skiing  Golf  Water Skiing  Sailing  Basketbal
comment1: Loved it. Exactly the way it was described. It is also within walking distance to a Publix grocery store, and if you don't want to carry the bags back you can take the Sun Trolley for $1. Overall we had a fantastic time and would love to come back again.
comment2: An appt was awesome. Infrastructure and room service were great. Location is very good. The ocean is clean.
comment3: Wonderful!  Janice was a pleasure to work with and very accommodating!  The home was clean, had everything we needed to enjoy our stay and was convenient to local shopping and beaches.  Will definitely use this listing again for my next visit.

name: House in the Ranches
description: Close to Cleveland Clinic Hospital and mayor highways - I75, Turnpike, I595. Ranches location, super quite, but close to everything! Supermarkets, malls, all at 15' distance and Ft Lauderdale and Miami airport about 30' away! Great location, close to most highways in the area (I-75, 595, Sawgrass Expressway). 30 minutes from the Miami Airport and Fort lauderdale Airport. 15' from Sawgrass mall and shops at Pines Blvd. House have all you need to leave in, full kitchen, laundry equipped with washer and dryer, nice pool and very cozy house! There is a swimming pool and barbecue outside to relax! It is a horse/farm like community, all around us are 1.15 acre lot so you don't really see the neighbors. You feel like you are in the farm staying convenient located close to all mayor places in the area like Miami, Art District, Ft Lauderdale area and beaches, Museums, Theaters all at or about 30 minutes distance. About a mile away there is a nice theater, little center with supermarket, cafes,
comment1: We had a fantastic  stay at Karims condo. Good space, washing machine, great view and close to everything. The staff at Hilton treated us as regular guests. Karim and Gary was taking care of us from we booked the condo, and until we left. They also gave us good recommendations on Restaurants - Chima was a success for the whole family.  We will definately come back!
comment3: Janice was a wonderful host.  Very accommodating, always willing to help and able to provide many recommendations for things to do in the area.  The home is right near the inter-coastal, which is beautiful.  The block is also very quiet and a mile from the beach.  The home is three bedrooms, big living room and two bathrooms.  Plenty of space for a small or large group.  We look forward to renting from Janice again in the near future!!!

name: MIAMI - LUXURY APARTMENT OVER BEACH
description: The apartment is located in an amazing building over the beach. it has private access to the beach.  the building counts with: heated pool over the beach private access to the beach gymn with new machines with view to the beach reading room Jacuzzi BBQ area near by the pool Valet parking with parking already included in price Washing and drying machines in every floor UNIT (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) : 2 bedrooms. 150 squared meters CAPACITY: 8 pax The apartment counts with: Internet (wifi and cable) Master bedroom with king bed, in suite bathroom and dressing room. LED TV in both bedrooms with cable. Secondary bedroom with king size bed and extra single sofa bed Second bathroom totally equiped.  Big living room with a sofa bed for two extra pax An extra air bed Dining room for up to 8 people Kitchen totally equiped for 8 (coffee machine, microwave, oven, dishwasher, etc) It has linen and towels, and pool towels for all the guests. Panoramic view to intercoastal from bedrooms and l
comment1: Karim and his team were awesome!  Great communication. Excellent space!  We had a wonderful time and will most certainly be back.
comment2:
We were very disappointed with this rental. When we arrived, it was filthy: rotten food in the fridge, dirty dishes, cereal in the sofa bed; broken glass on the balcony.  While we called and were able to receive housekeeping that evening, no one was apologetic and the cleaning we received was cursory. The condo is dirty. The walls are dirty; the upholstery smells.  Our experience was tainted by this residual dirt. 

The listing states that renters are not entitled to Hilton guest services, but there aren't enough towels for a family of four at the beach for a week, and zero information on laundry. So, we availed ourselves of housekeeping which felt awkward but was required. 

The view from the balcony includes a bit of ocean, an empty lot that will soon be a construction site, and a fully built but empty hotel. Not relaxing. 

Overall, very disappointing and kind of gross.
comment3: Janice is an fine host. She was very prompt on communications. The house was clean and we found it to suit our needs in South Florida. It is recently updated with new appliances .The area is very nice and we always felt safe. There was no internet access , and running a web based business , it became a issue. The television was dated . This was only a problem because we watched the Super Bowl there ! All in all we had a great stay !!

Dining room for up to 6 people Kitchen totally equiped for 6 (coffee machine, microwave, oven, dishwasher, etc) It has linen and towels, and pool towels for all the guests. link for more pictures  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  UNIT MINIMUM STAY O
comment1: Excellent hotel location. Service was good. Karim  responded fast and gary was always present to help and always calls to check if we needed something. Would recommand
comment2: Great Condo and Fantastic location. We had a super stay and can recommend the place to others.
comment3: Nice place in an excellent, peaceful and family friendly neighborhood.  Janice was easy to communicate with and helpful with our needs.  This place provides a great alternative to a hotel for a larger family.

name: Lakefront Pool Home -Fort Lauderdale
description: Large bedroom with bamboo flooring, gorgeous carved wood Queen bed, walk in closet and soaring volume ceiling (adjacent room/office available if needed). Full bath/shower, laundry room, large kitchen, indoor and outdoor lakefront dining, heated pool/hot tub on the lake with beautiful sunset views.   House well maintained, quiet and clean. Friendly, adorable dogs on premises. Home also wheelchair accessible, ramped entry, pool lift, shower bench available. ADA height toilet. Rent per night or for long term (discounted): Fully elegantly furnished home..you have 1 private room with Queen Bed,  1 full bath (shower/Tub) and 1 half bath plus access to a private office space in a luxurious 3900 square ft Lakefront home. Heated Pool/Hot Tub -Jacuzzi, Guard gated community, centrally located near Parks, beaches, tennis, golf (minutes from Bonaventure Golf and Country Club, spas, Town Center, parks and biking/walking paths ) and Shopping, (Sawgrass Mall!) and restaurants galore.    The City of W
comment1: Very nice condo. All as described. Nothing negative to say. Karim is friendly and very reliable.
comment2: Excellent experience! Great location!
comment3: Jon & Janice's place was absolutely beautiful. They were a pleasure to rent from and I'll definitely consider stayng here again.

name: CODY PLACE  15 minutes from the Beach and Stadium

You'll love my place because of the views, the location, the people, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families, and big groups Disabled-friendly home with wheelchair accessible ramp for easy access in/out; roll-in shower with grab bars... Very quiet neighborhood, close to University Drive and all Major Highway..... Wireless Internet is included.... Tennis, racquet ball, basket ball, just bring your gears.... Close to the Beaches,Parks,Malls, Publix Supermarket, Laundry Facilities Churches and the Hard Rock. comment2:
I was skeptical about renting a private apartment. 
Usually we stay at hotels.

But I must admit that Karim's description was fair and clear. 
And the view was amazing. Just like in the pictures. No cheating. 
The balcony was a little smaller than we expected, but it did not matter.

2 times we need help. Both times the problem was solved quickly and smoothly.

The one time it was settled by one of the owners, Denise. Quickly and professionally.

Similarly, when Gary Fong should help us with a basin there virkde. And he solved it quickly and effectively. We met Gary personally - he is a trustworthy and friendly person you can trust.

And thanks for the tip to park at North Beach Hotel at half price. And we parked only 100 meters from the entrance to the Hilton.

We just got back to Denmark - and can only say that we were happy to stay 14 days in this beautiful apartment.

We recommend this apartment to anyone 
- except in the periods we would like to rent it - SMILING  :-)

Hanni and Rolf Hoegh
Denmark
comment3:
We are 5 people ( 35/45) from France and we stayed in Jon and Janice house for 3 nights but we could have stayed there forever - it was just perfect.  Facilities are wonderful, everything was clean and tip top when we arrived. The kitchen was very well equipped. The house is super spacious, beds are comfortable..
What an adorable place! This area is beautiful, and near the beach..
We will definitely be back, hope in october.. Thanks Janice !

name: Tropical Beach Paradise Awaits You
description: Imagine being one block from the ocean in an area with one of the prettiest beaches in the United States and staying in a large, spacious room with a full kitchen and walk-in closet.  You do not have to imagine any longer. Come and stay with us. Imagine being one block from the ocean in an area with one of the prettiest beaches in the United States and staying in a large, spacious room with a full kitchen and walk-in closet. You do not have to imagine any longer. Come and stay at the beautiful Ocean Pearl Motel, where you will be treated not like a guest, but as a friend. We are located in Deerfield Beach, which is one mile South of Boca Raton and 15 minutes North of Fort Lauderdale Airport. We are pet friendly and also offer monthly rates.
comment1: If your gong to stay in Fort Lauderdale, this is the only place you need to look at! Nothing short of fabulous. Right on the beach with spectacular views of both beach and intercoastal waterways, this apartment has it all. Lovely large balcony to enjoy the sunrise while having breakfast, or an evening drink to enjoy the sunset at the end of the day. Small kitchen that has everything you need to cut costs of eating out, large living, bedrooms and bathrooms. Can easily accommodate a family of four, or six if you don't mind a bit of a squeeze. The hotel staff at the pool, reception and valet were to notch and made our stay most enjoyable. Only one mile from Galleria Mall which has many restaurants and a food court, and across the street from that is a local Publix. Morning coffee is free from the breakfast restaurant on the sixth floor!! Allow an additional $35 a day for valet parking, a bit pricy, but honestly the most convenient for the duration of our stay. We look forward to staying again in the future when we will be in town visiting family. Karim provided all necessary information to make sure our stay was an absolute pleasure.
comment2: Hello Karim,thanks for you place it was fantastic.hope to come back again.
comment3:
We spent 3 days at Jon & Janice's place with our three teenage boys during the 2nd week of March 2013. We didn't get to meet Janice who did all the correspondence, but the check in was easy and we appreciated her quick response whenever needed. Janice‚Äòs place was just as shown on the pictures. Well equipped, convenient and clean. The only inconvenience (especially for our three teenage boys) to be worth mentioned was the missing internet access. The house is located near the intercoastal, so Sawgrass Mills Malls, Miami Beach and not to forget Miami Airport were within easy reach. We had a nice stay, thank you!
TH & family
